DOC.brief_summary: In randomize controlled clinical trial , compare effect timolol versus placebo treatment myopic regression LASIK
DOC.brief_title: Effect Timolol Refractive Outcomes Eyes With Myopic Regression After LASIK : Randomized Clinical Trial

Patients history previous ocular surgery , keratoconus ectatic corneal disorder , keratoconus suspect topography , preoperative corneal opacity , corneal dystrophy , presence pterygium , retinal disorder , collagen vascular disorder , diabetes mellitus , glaucoma , cataract , pregnancy , breast feeding systemic corticosteroid therapy exclude .
